fulltext:
Tung Nguyen 
OBJECTIVE 
I have worked with Java, its frameworks and Microservice Architecture for 3 years. Absolutely, it is so 
attracted to me so that I would like to continue learning in depth and investigate more Java Virtual 
Machine and Operation System comprehensively. Beside the hard skills, I am improving the soft 
skills such as communication skills, explainmination skills and leadship qualities. 
Therefore I am looking for a professional and internal environment where I can maximize my 
contribution  and accumulate more experience to become a Java Technical Architecture next 4 
years. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
May 2016 - Present
Swiss Post Solution 
Java Developer 
- Maintain Web-Services, Web-Applications serving Post Logistic of
Switzerland and implement the change requests. 
- Research new technology and architecture for software team. 
- Developing the platform serving for all projects in SPS Vietnam and
SPS Global. 
- Work with technical architect to finalize low level design and report what
investigating new technology for him 
- Use JIRA, Trello project tracking. 
Feb 2016 - May 2016
TMA Solutions 
Java Developer 
- Develop Web-Application managing a list of UNIX command line and
executing them automatically. 
PROJECTS 
Centralize Document Input Processing Platform 
(Jan 2017 - Current) 
Customer 
Swiss Post Solution Global 
Description 
- The main business of Swiss Post is Digital Data Processing. Therefore, they 
would like an centralize system handling the different documents and be 
scalable, high securities.  
Team size 
12 
My position 
One of three key members 
- Work with technical architect to finalize the low level design 
My responsibilities 
- Discuss with IT department of customer to finalize the integration mechanism 
- Development 
- Bug Fixing 
- Java 8 programing language 
- Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA/Elasticsearch, Spring Integration, Spring Cloud 
Config, Spring Cloud Dataflow 
Technologies used 
- ActiveMQ, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL 
- Docker 
- WSO2 products: API Manager, Identity Server 
- Inubit BPM 
Post Logistic System 
(May 2016 - Dec 2016) 
Customer 
Post Logistic Switzerland 
Description 
- Post Logistic Switzerland digitalizes the parcel information and submit to the 
system. It validates, classifies and deliveries these information to the 
correspond Webhooks. 
Team size 
6 
My position 
Java developer 
My responsibilities 
- Develop change requests from customer. 
- Java 8 programing language 
Technologies used 
- Spring boot, Spring Data JPA 
- Docker 
- Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL 
Genband Loadline Up 
(Feb 2016 - May 2016) 
Customer 
Internal Team TMA 
Description 
- This web-application help the devops in managing the list of UNIX command 
line and executing them automatically 
Team size 
3 
My position 
Java developer 
My responsibilities 
- Development. 
- Optimize code 
- Bug Fixing 
- Java programing language 
Technologies used 
- J2EE 
- jQuery 
CERTIFICATIONS 
2016 
Java Developer Certification from University of Science, HCMC 
EDUCATION 
Sep 2013 - May 2016 
Banking University, HCMC 
Major: Management Information System 
SKILLS 
Programming 
Java, JavaScript 
Operating System 
MacOS, Windows, Ubuntu, Centos 
Language 
English 
INTERESTS 
I prefer investigating new technology that relevant Microservice Architecture and reading about computer 
programing and architectures.  
REFERENCES 
Mobile: 0901299856 - Mr. Dung: Team leader
